END, [m.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [m.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [m.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [m.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [m.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [m.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [m.ProductCategory].[LevelCate], [m.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [m.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [m.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [m.ProductCategory].[IsDelete], [m.ProductCategory].[Status], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [m.ProductCategory].[Id], [m].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [m].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [m].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [m].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [m].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [m].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [m].[Status] AS [Status0], [m].[IsDelete] AS [IsDelete0], [m].[SortOrder] AS [SortOrder0]

END, [dto.Color].[Name] AS [Name1], [dto.Color].[Code], CASE

END, [dto.Color].[Name] AS [Name1], [dto.Color].[Code], CASE
    WHEN [dto].[SizeId] IS NOT NULL
    THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT)
END, [dto.Size].[Name] AS [Name2]
FROM [PRD_BillDetails] AS [dto]
INNER JOIN [PRD_Sizes] AS [dto.Size] ON [dto].[SizeId] = [dto.Size].[Id]
INNER JOIN [PRD_Colors] AS [dto.Color] ON [dto].[ColorId] = [dto.Color].[Id]
INNER JOIN [PRD_Products] AS [dto.Product] ON [dto].[ProductId] = [dto.Product].[Id]
INNER JOIN [PRD_ProductCategories] AS [dto.Product.ProductCategory] ON [dto.Product].[CategoryId] = [dto.Product.ProductCategory].[Id]
WHERE @_outer_Id = [dto].[BillId]" (0723d8ff)

OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted3;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [MAN_Slides] t
INNER JOIN @inserted3 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];

FROM [PRD_BillDetails] AS [dto]

INNER JOIN [PRD_Colors] AS [dto.Color] ON [dto].[ColorId] = [dto.Color].[Id]

WHERE @_outer_Id = [dto].[BillId]" (0723d8ff)

END, [m.ProductCategory].[Name] AS [Name0], [m.ProductCategory].[Description] AS [Description0], [m.ProductCategory].[ParentId], [m.ProductCategory].[HomeOrder], [m.ProductCategory].[Image] AS [Image0], [m.ProductCategory].[HomeFlag] AS [HomeFlag0], [m.ProductCategory].[LevelCate], [m.ProductCategory].[DateCreated], [m.ProductCategory].[DateModified], [m.ProductCategory].[SortOrder], [m.ProductCategory].[IsDelete], [m.ProductCategory].[Status], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoPageTitle], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoAlias], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoKeywords], [m.ProductCategory].[SeoDescription], [m.ProductCategory].[Id], [m].[SeoPageTitle] AS [SeoPageTitle0], [m].[SeoAlias] AS [SeoAlias0], [m].[SeoKeywords] AS [SeoKeywords0], [m].[SeoDescription] AS [SeoDescription0], [m].[DateCreated] AS [DateCreated0], [m].[DateModified] AS [DateModified0], [m].[Status] AS [Status0], [m].[IsDelete] AS [IsDelete0], [m].[SortOrder] AS [SortOrder0]
FROM [PRD_Products] AS [m]
INNER JOIN [PRD_ProductCategories] AS [m.ProductCategory] ON [m].[CategoryId] = [m.ProductCategory].[Id]" (0723d8ff)
